original: Jonson, Eskil Magnus Lorentz, kyrkoherde, Vislanda, f. 21/12/95 i Breda-ryd, Jönköp. 1., av folkskoll. o. org. Carl J. o. Amanda Lorentzson. G. 22 m. Hanna Paulsson. Barn: Per f. 23, Carl 26. — Stud:ex. i Jönköp. 15, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 16, teol. kand. samt praikt. teol. prov 21, prästv. f. Växjö stift 22. Varit v. kommin. i Hänger o. Våxtorp samt bitr. åt v. pasit. i Värnamo, kommin. i Hånger 23, i Sankt Sigfrid 24, kyrkoh. i Södra Hestra o. Gryteryds past. 32, i Vislanda o. Blä-dinge sed. 46. Ordf. i kyrkostämma o. skolråd.
translated: Jonson, Eskil Magnus Lorentz, clergyman, Vislanda, b. 21/12/95 in Breda-ryd, Jönköping Co., 1st child of elementary school teacher and organist Carl J. and Amanda Lorentzson. Married in 1922 to Hanna Paulsson. Children: Per b. 1923, Carl b. 1926. He graduated from high school in Jönköping in 1915, received a Bachelor of Arts in Theology from Lund University in 1916, a Master of Theology and practical theology examination in 1921, and was ordained as a priest for the Växjö diocese in 1922. He has been a deputy vicar in Hänger and Våxtorp and an assistant to the vicar in Värnamo, vicar in Hånger in 1923, St. Sigfrid in 1924, vicar in Södra Hestra and Gryteryds parish in 1932 and in Vislanda and Blädinge since 1946. He has been chairman of the church meeting and school council.

education.name: Master of Theology and Practical Theology Examination
